metadata.title: CVE-2021-41303 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Apache Shiro before 1.8.0, when using Apache Shiro with Spring Boot, aspecially crafted HTTP request may cause an authentication bypass. Usersshould update to Apache Shiro 1.8.0.

criterions.comment: shiro: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
